WorkItem.ClosedComment: Take the Fight Duration and reduce it below 300 (E.g.- 299) Then you will see value to Rapid Killing. This also works at any point where an additional Rapid Fire could occur (multiples of 240-1 and/or 300-1 in fight duration).Root cause for not seeing constant value is that it doesn't take in partial activates to smooth it over. This would require a major rewrite to the activates system in Hunter
WorkItem.Description: In the attached file, changing or removing the Rapid killing talent does not affect the dps. It seems to be "always on".
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Rapid Killing Talent has no value
